lines.text: You know what I feel like?
A Big Mac?
The man's psychic!
Hiya, kid. How's it going?
It's fine.
Nice teddy bear.
[laughs]

[after seeing that the mess the house was previously in has been cleared up]
I can't believe it, the house looks perfect, you cleared up this mess for me?
is this something we would do?
Good point.

[yelling to Eric after he falls off a cliff in his wheelchair]
Swim to the side Eric! Swim!
It's ruined. It's totally ruined.
It wasn't me, mom! It was a little creature! I saw it!
The house is totally destroyed.
What do you want me to say?
I don't want you to say anything!

[after Michael tells her that the FBI agents are here in McDonalds]
Well, what are we gonna do?
I don't know. Just keep him dancing and they'll just think it's a teddy.

I can't face the Thought of you leaving So take me along I swear I'll be strong If you take me Wherever you go I wanna learn the things That you know Now that you Made me believe I want you to take me 'Cause I long to be able To see the things That you see know that whatever you do I'll follow you Somebody must have Sent you to me What do I have You could possibly need All I can give is my guarantee We'll be friends forever Repeat chorus Teach me more in Each passing hour By your side I know I will cower Is it true that You have the power To capture this moment in time Take me wherever you go I wanna learn the things That you know Now that you made me believe I want you to take me 'Cause I long to be able To see the things That you see Know that Whatever you do I'll follow you
That thing I was telling you about, it's in the teddy suit.
Oh, no way. He's so cute.
Yeah, real cute. Listen, those guys who are following us, they're here.

[spinning a flower in a soda can straw]
Maybe these are just flowers?
How about a spaceship?
Great.
Yeah, and then we have a close encounter of the third kind.
Who broke the lamp?
Well, Sherlock Holmes, here. thinks he saw a ghost.
Hey, look at all the cars! Pretty nice...
Pretty nice.
